intro.title: 28-A Blackout Timeline
intro.body:
On April 28, 2025, the Iberian Peninsula experienced a massive blackout that left millions of people in Spain and Portugal without electricity.

This is the timeline of events that led to this incident according to the official report published by the Government of Spain in the fall of 2025.
intro.reportLink: Official Report from the Government of Spain

errorApi.message: There was an error loading the timeline
